mapper.select: select OBJECT_INSTANCE_BEGIN, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_SCHEMA, OBJECT_NAME, OWNER_THREAD_ID, OWNER_EVENT_ID, INTERNAL_LOCK, EXTERNAL_LOCK from table_handles where OBJECT_INSTANCE_BEGIN = #{OBJECT_INSTANCE_BEGIN,jdbcType=BIGINT}
